insertCondition.caption: The Link Chart can be edited
The Link Chart can be edited
The symbol size of the Link Chart can be changed
The Link Chart can be extended from the selection
The link chart can be extended from the >2 selection
The selected property can be deleted
The selected property can be cleared
The Link Chart contains selected entities or relationships
The Link Chart can be extended from the selection
Relationships can be grouped in the Link Chart.
The create relationship tool can be activated
Add a basemap to a Link Chart

content.name: Graph Query
content.onboardingMessage:
**Graph Query**
Generate graph queries that can be executed in your investigations.
1. **Select a data connection**
Choose a knowledge graph data connection from the dropdown in data context.
2. **Describe your query in natural language**
Type out what you want from the selected knowledge graph and hit return. For example, "get all direct connections".
**Note:** You must have an investigation open to add the resulting queries to that investigation.
content.promptHint: Ask a question or type / for commands. Use Ctrl + Up or Down arrows to scroll previous questions.
content.tooltip: Help me create a graph query

button.caption: Increase Symbol
button.tooltip: Increase symbol size of the selected Link Chart sublayers.There is currently no selected Link Chart feature layer in the Contents pane.

button.caption: Dynamic
button.tooltip: Turn the Dynamic Selection mode on or off for the active Link Chart. When the Dynamic Selection mode is turned on for a Link Chart, each time the set of entities or relationships currently selected in the geographic map changes, the Link Chart selected entities and relationships are automatically updated to reflect the selection change.

button.caption: Apply Layout To Link Chart
button.extendedCaption: Apply a layout to the Link Chart
button.tooltip: Apply layout to the Link Chart.Click the Edit button in the Edit ribbon to enable these commands.

button.caption: Set Roots
button.extendedCaption: Define or clear the Link Chart root nodes
button.tooltip: Make the selected nodes the new Link Chart root nodes or clear the list.Click the Edit button in the Edit ribbon to enable this command.

button.caption: Select Roots
button.extendedCaption: Make a new selection set from the Link Chart root nodes
button.tooltip: Make the Link Chart root nodes the new selection set.

button.caption: Show Roots
button.extendedCaption: Toggle the display of the root nodes
button.tooltip: Toogle the display of the Link Chart root nodes.

button.caption: Connect
button.extendedCaption: Add missing relationships between selected entities and Link Chart entities, or between all Link Chart entities if the selection is empty
button.tooltip: Add missing relationships between selected entities and Link Chart entities, or between all Link Chart entities if the selection is empty.Click the Edit button in the Edit ribbon to enable this command.

button.caption: Find Paths
button.extendedCaption: Find all shortest paths between pairs of selected entities, and add the corresponding entities and relationships to the Link Chart.
button.tooltip: Find all shortest paths between pairs of selected entities, and add the corresponding entities and relationships to the Link Chart. There is currently less than 2 selected entities or relationships, or editing is disabled (Edit button in Edit ribbon).

button.caption: Filtered Find Paths
button.extendedCaption: Using filtered find paths, find all shortest paths between pairs of selected entities, and add the corresponding entities and relationships to the Link Chart.
button.tooltip: Using filtered find paths, find all shortest paths between pairs of selected entities, and add the corresponding entities and relationships to the Link Chart. There is currently less than 2 selected entities or relationships, or editing is disabled (Edit button in Edit ribbon).

button.caption: Expand
button.extendedCaption: Add all entities and relationships directly connected to the selected entities.
button.tooltip: Add all entities and relationships directly connected to the selected entities.There is currently no selected entity in the Link Chart, or editing is disabled (Edit button in Edit ribbon).

button.caption: Filtered Expand
button.extendedCaption: Using a filter on relationship types, add some entities and relationships directly connected to the selected entities.
button.tooltip: Using an optional filter on relationship types, add entities and relationships directly connected to the selected entities.There is currently no selected entity in the Link Chart, or editing is disabled (Edit button in Edit ribbon).

button.caption: Select Between
button.extendedCaption: Select entities that are linked to at least 2 entities in the input selection.
button.tooltip: Select entities that are linked to at least 2 entities in the input selection.There is currently no selected entity in the Link Chart, or editing is disabled (Edit button in Edit ribbon).

button.caption: Find Between
button.extendedCaption: Find entities that are linked to at least 2 entities in the input selection.
button.tooltip: Find entities that are linked to at least 2 entities in the input selection.There is currently no selected entity in the Link Chart, or editing is disabled (Edit button in Edit ribbon).

button.caption: Trim
button.extendedCaption: Remove leaf entities connected to selected entities, or all leaf entities if the selection is empty
button.tooltip: Remove leaf entities connected to selected entities, or all leaf entities if the selection is empty. No entity is removed from the Knowledge Graph.Click the Edit button in the Edit ribbon to enable this command.

button.caption: Explore
button.tooltip: Switch to Explore Tool. Switch to Explore Tool.

button.caption: Create Relationship
button.tooltip: Create Relationship. Create Relationship.

checkBox.tooltip: Automatically group relationships that are added to the Link Chart.

button.caption: Group
button.tooltip: Group the selected relationships, or all relationships if no relationship is selected.A chronological layout is used, or editing is disabled (Edit button in Edit ribbon).

button.caption: Ungroup
button.tooltip: Ungroup the selected relationships.There is currently no selection in the Link Chart, or editing is disabled (Edit button in Edit ribbon).

button.caption: Group
button.tooltip: Group selected entities.There is currently no selection in the Link Chart, or editing is disabled (Edit button in Edit ribbon).

button.caption: Ungroup

button.caption: Remove
button.extendedCaption: Remove selected entities and relationships from the Link Chart scope.
button.tooltip: Remove selected entities and relationships from the Link Chart. No entity or relationship is removed from the Knowledge Graph. There is currently no selection in the Link Chart, or editing is disabled (Edit button in Edit ribbon).

button.caption: Select Neighbors
